data.title: Twisted Pig Ale & Smokehouse
data.meta_description: Located in historic Port Norfolk the Twisted Pig Ale and Smokehouse is a place for Everyone, Everyday.
data.text:
Every single thing I've eaten here has been bussing fr fr especially the brisket. All the ladies who work here are so nice and welcoming. I've met really cool people here. They do karaoke on some nights and have a breakfast brunch buffet with a mimosa bar on Sundays. The drinks in the machine are a passion fruit Margarita and the chocolate one is a Bushwacker. You probably only need one it's very good ðŸ˜‚

I loved the comfortable atmosphere. Food was amazing! The lady who waited on us was very pleasant and attentive. I observed that they have different events every night. I will be back

First time here, we called our order inâ€¦Got the smoked chicken garden salad, pulled pork sandwich & fried Oreos.. from answering the phone to checkout, the customer service was awesome. The food was amazing, my husband seriously hasnâ€™t stopped raving about this place. Highly recommend!

The staff are amazingly AWESOME! The food is out of this world! We got the chicken quesadilla and the Mac N Cheese croc.... It came with tater tots some homemade Bacon bits your choice of pulled pork or chicken a layer of sharp cheese sprinkled on top and some green onions omg it was SOOO good and of course the drinks were good too!!!
